definition: lit. to foster an ulcer and bequeath a calamity (idiom); tolerating budding evil can only lead to disaster/to cherish a viper in one's bosom
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)

sentences.english: We can never leave evil unchecked, we must remove the source of the trouble.
sentences.chinese: 我們決不可養癰遺患，一定要斬草除根。
